title: Cardais
body: A place in the parish of Água de Pena. In this location, on land he owned, Canon Henrique Modesto de Betencourt built a chapel dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus in the year 1907.

Água de Pena: Place in the parish of Água de Pena. In this location, on land he owned, Canon Henrique Modesto de Betencourt built a chapel dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus in the year 1907.

1907: Built a chapel dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus
